001package io.jstach.rainbowgum;
002
003import io.jstach.rainbowgum.annotation.LogConfigurable;
004
005/**
006 * A marker interface for custom or generated builders.
007 *
008 * @param <B> builder
009 * @param <O> created on build
010 * @apiNote This interface is for discovery and documentation so that one can find all the
011 * builders supported by Rainbow Gum.
012 * @see LogConfigurable
013 */
014public interface LogBuilder<B, O> {
015
016        /**
017         * Will try to convert string key values to parameters needed by the builder.
018         * @param properties log properties
019         * @return this.
020         */
021        public B fromProperties(LogProperties properties);
022
023        /**
024         * Will try to convert string key values to parameters needed by the builder.
025         * @param properties log properties.
026         * @param ref provider reference.
027         * @return this.
028         */
029        default B fromProperties(LogProperties properties, LogProviderRef ref) {
030                String prefix = propertyPrefix();
031                var uri = ref.uri();
032                var uriKey = ref.keyOrNull();
033                LogProperties combined = LogProperties.of(uri, prefix, properties, uriKey);
034                return fromProperties(combined);
035        }
036
037        /**
038         * The property prefix used to resolve which properties to extract from LogProperties.
039         * @return prefix which should ideally end in {@value LogProperties#SEP}.
040         * @see LogConfigurable#prefix()
041         */
042        public String propertyPrefix();
043
044}
